{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05439v1", "title": "Stabilization of Kac polynomials", "summary": "We study the stabilization behavior of cohomology groups associated with
moduli spaces of quiver representations for a fixed quiver $Q$. Under mild
conditions on a dimension vector $\delta$, we show that the dimensions of these
cohomology groups stabilize when a sufficiently large multiple of $\delta$ is
added. We derive explicit formulas for the stabilized dimensions and, in
particular, obtain stabilization of the coefficients of Kac polynomials.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT,math.AG", "published": "2025-05-08T17:30:18Z"}
